changelog: Stable release of Hydra Achievements Manager.
A tool designed to manage and unlock achievements in Hydra.
Added multi-language support: PT-BR, EN-US, ES-ES, RU, UK, IT.
Introduced Game Manager: new section with achievement progress and quick navigation.
Redesigned interface for a more modern, intuitive, and customizable experience.
Optimized overall performance.
Full translation implemented.
Fixed: Duplicate achievements issue in the manager UI and bugs during achievement generation.
Improved: Detection and display system to prevent duplicate achievements.
Optimized: Achievement file processing to ensure unique entries.
Added support for multiple game directory structures: OnlineFix, RLD!, Codex, Rune (automatic recognition).
Note: OnlineFix support may be unstable due to potential Hydra bugs.
Implemented achievement loading from existing directories.
Integrated new Hydra API as default method.
No need to generate a Steam key anymore — although manual switching is still available in settings.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
New Feature:
Game Search Tab: You can now search for games directly within the app using a dedicated search tab.
Updates and Improvements:
In-App Update Checking: The app now automatically checks for new versions to keep you up to date.
Interface Optimization: Improved interface for a lighter, smoother, and better-performing experience.
Bug Fixes:
General bug fixes and adjustments to enhance stability and usability.
Release Date: 2025-05-20
New Features:
Added support for light theme, allowing users to switch between light and dark modes.
Redesigned and improved interface for a more intuitive and modern user experience.
Improvements:
Implemented game data export, generating a JSON file with progress data and a folder containing achievement icons.
Added option to select a custom directory when generating achievements.
Bug Fixes:
Various fixes to improve system stability and resolve previous issues.
Release Date: 2025-05-21
Improvements:
Fix JSON data export.
New initial screen wizard.
The entire project has been fully rewritten in TypeScript, bringing improved stability, scalability, and maintainability.
New Features:
Time Formatting Options: Added support for multiple date/time styles, including 12-hour (AM/PM) format.
Expanded Language Support: Hydra Achievement Manager now supports more languages: Polski, Français, 中文 (简体), 日本語.
Improvements:
Major codebase modernization with TypeScript.
Better handling of localization and time display.
Fixes:
Resolved multiple long-standing issues from the previous version.
Improved stability and reduced crashes.
Bug Fixes:
Timestamp Handling Refactor:
Fixed: Timestamp normalization now applies consistently across all date/time formats.
Resolved an issue where older timestamps kept the wrong formatting.
Conversions between 12h and 24h are now reflected instantly across the UI.
Prevents mismatches between newly loaded and existing achievement timestamps.
Achievement Data Refresh:
Fixed: Achievement data now refreshes automatically after any modification.
UI immediately updates the status of unlocked achievements.
Prevents displaying outdated information when the source file changes.
Improved reliability when switching between games with large achievement lists.
